title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify user can login successfully using correct email/password credentials and receive valid JWT token

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid email and password
Click login button
Verify login success and JWT token is issued

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify login fails with incorrect email or password and error message is displayed

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid email or password
Click login button
Verify login fails with appropriate error notification

title: OAuth Login via Google and Kakao
description: Verify users can login using OAuth providers Google and Kakao with successful authentication and JWT token reception

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Select 'Login with Google' option
Complete Google OAuth login flow
Verify user is authenticated and JWT token is issued
Repeat steps selecting 'Login with Kakao' option
Verify Kakao OAuth flow completes successfully with valid token

title: Dashboard Displays Correct Portfolio and Trading Stats
description: Verify main dashboard correctly fetches and displays accurate portfolio overview, balance and trading statistics as per backend data

steps.description: Login successfully and navigate to dashboard page
Check that portfolio overview section loads
Verify portfolio balance matches backend portfolio data
Verify trading statistics reflect recent user trades accurately

title: Create and Start AI Trend Trading Bot
description: Verify user can successfully create a new AI Trend trading bot with valid parameters, start the bot, and observe active status

steps.description: Navigate to Bot Management page
Initiate creation of new AI Trend bot
Fill in all required parameters with valid values
Submit bot creation form
Verify bot is created and listed in Bot Management interface
Start the created bot
Verify bot status updates to running and operational

title: Stop AI Trend Trading Bot
description: Verify user can stop a running AI Trend bot and the status updates accordingly

steps.description: Navigate to Bot Management page
Select a running AI Trend bot
Click stop button for the bot
Verify bot status updates to stopped and no trading activity occurs

title: Apply AI-Recommended Grid Bot Template and Perform Backtesting
description: Verify user can select an AI-recommended grid bot template, configure parameters, run backtesting with historical data, and see correct performance metrics

steps.description: Navigate to AI-recommended Grid Bot Templates section
Select a suitable grid bot template
Open backtesting interface for the selected template
Input valid backtesting parameters including date ranges
Run backtest
Verify backtest completes successfully and performance metrics are displayed accurately

title: Admin Create, Update, Delete Grid Bot Templates
description: Verify admin users can create new grid bot templates, update existing templates, delete templates and perform template backtesting without errors

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to Grid Template Manager page
Create a new grid bot template with valid data
Verify new template appears in the template list
Select a template and update parameters
Verify updates persist and reflect in template details
Delete a selected template
Verify template is removed from the list
Run backtesting on a selected template
Verify backtesting completes successfully with accurate results

title: Real-Time Trading with Live TradingView Chart and Position Management
description: Verify user can view live price data on TradingView chart, open, close, and manage positions correctly in real-time trading interface

steps.description: Navigate to Real-time Trading page
Verify TradingView chart loads and updates live prices
Open a new trading position with valid parameters
Verify position is opened and reflected in position list
Close the open position
Verify position status updates to closed and PnL is correctly calculated

title: Trading History Accuracy
description: Verify Trading History page accurately displays past trades with correct timestamps, volumes, prices, and performance analytics matching backend data

steps.description: Navigate to Trading History page
Verify trade records match backend stored trade data
Verify performance analytics such as profits, losses, and trade counts are calculated correctly

title: Configure and Save Trading Strategies and Alerts
description: Verify user can configure trading strategies and alerts on price changes or trade events and changes persist correctly

steps.description: Navigate to Strategy Management page
Create or update trading strategy parameters
Set alerts and notifications for specific price thresholds or trade statuses
Save configuration
Verify strategy and alert settings are saved and persist after page reload
Verify alerts trigger correctly when conditions are met during real-time data updates

title: User Settings and API Key Management
description: Verify user can update personal settings including API keys, preferences and changes persist with backend synchronization

steps.description: Navigate to User Settings page
Update API key with valid value and save
Verify API key is saved and backend reflects the update
Change user preferences and save
Verify preferences persist and are applied on next login

title: WebSocket Real-Time Data Updates and Reconnection Handling
description: Verify WebSocket connection establishes correctly for real-time updates, updates UI timely, and gracefully handles disconnections with automatic reconnection attempts

steps.description: Login and open trading interface with WebSocket connection
Verify real-time price and position updates received and displayed promptly via WebSocket
Simulate WebSocket disconnection (network interruption)
Verify UI indicates connection lost and then automatically reconnects
Verify real-time updates resume after successful reconnection

title: API Consistency and Error Handling Across Frontend and Backend
description: Verify API endpoints comply with schema contracts, return appropriate errors for invalid requests, and frontend correctly handles these errors showing user-friendly messages

steps.description: Make various API calls with valid and invalid payloads
Verify backend returns proper HTTP status codes and error messages
Verify frontend handles error responses gracefully without crashing
Verify error messages shown to user are clear and actionable

title: Backtest Edge Case: Empty Historical Data
description: Verify the backtesting engine handles cases with empty or missing historical candle data gracefully without crashing and informs user properly

steps.description: Select a grid bot template
Configure backtesting with a date range where no historical data exists
Run backtest
Verify backtest returns no results but does not crash
Verify user receives a meaningful error or info message about lack of data

title: Bot Management: Invalid Bot Configuration
description: Verify creating or updating a bot with invalid or missing required parameters results in appropriate validation errors preventing bot creation or update

steps.description: Navigate to create new Grid or AI Trend bot
Input invalid or incomplete configuration data
Attempt to submit the bot creation form
Verify validation errors are shown and bot is not created

title: Alerts Trigger on Price Change Event
description: Verify price alert configured by user triggers a notification when the market price crosses the threshold in real-time

steps.description: Set a price alert on a trading pair for a specified threshold price
Simulate or wait for market price to cross threshold
Verify alert notification appears promptly in Alerts and Notifications UI
